Package org.neo4j.internal.batchimport

Class RelationshipLinkStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.internal.batchimport.staging.AbstractStep<T>
      • org.neo4j.internal.batchimport.staging.ForkedProcessorStep<RelationshipRecord[]>
        • org.neo4j.internal.batchimport.RelationshipLinkStep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Parallelizable, Panicable, Step<RelationshipRecord[]>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RelationshipLinkbackStep, RelationshipLinkforwardStep
    public abstract class RelationshipLinkStep
extends ForkedProcessorStep<RelationshipRecord[]>
    Links relationship chains together, the "prev" pointers of them. "next" pointers are set when initially creating the relationship records. Setting prev pointers at that time would incur random access and so that is done here separately with help from NodeRelationshipCache.

      private RelationshipLinkingProgress findLinkingProgressStatsProvider()
